tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
  time_stamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
  location_id UUID,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR,
  speed FLOAT,
  congestion_level VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_patterns (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    traffic_volume INT,
    congestion_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
  vehicle_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  speed FLOAT,
  location VARCHAR,
  PRIMARY KEY (vehicle_id, timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE road_network (
  road_id INT,
  road_name VARCHAR,
  road_length FLOAT,
  road_capacity INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (road_id)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_congestion (
  congestion_id INT,
  road_id INT,
  congestion_level VARCHAR,
  congestion_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (congestion_id)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_analysis (
  analysis_id INT,
  road_id INT,
  start_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  end_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  analysis_results JSON,
  PRIMARY KEY (analysis_id)
);
